$schema: Monster seed data for DC20 Monster Forge
_instructions: Fill in the monster data below. Each monster needs a unique UUID. You can generate UUIDs at uuidgenerator.net or use 'crypto.randomUUID()' in browser console.

monsters.name: Goblin Warrior
monsters.description: A small, vicious humanoid with green skin and sharp teeth.
monsters.lore: Goblins are small, black-hearted humanoids that lair in despoiled dungeons and other dismal settings.
monsters.tactics: Goblins prefer ambushes and gang tactics, attacking from hiding with ranged weapons before closing to melee.

monsters.name: Skeleton
monsters.description: A magically animated pile of bones that obeys its creator's commands.
monsters.lore: Skeletons are the animated bones of the dead, raised by dark magic.
monsters.tactics: Skeletons mindlessly follow orders, fighting until destroyed.

monsters.name: Wolf
monsters.description: A gray-furred predator with keen senses and pack instincts.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee natural attack. Target must succeed on a Save or be knocked prone.

monsters.lore: Wolves hunt in packs, using coordinated tactics to bring down prey.
monsters.tactics: Wolves try to surround prey and knock it prone for advantage.

monsters.name: Orc Berserker
monsters.description: A savage humanoid warrior consumed by bloodlust.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee weapon attack. Brutal: Extra damage on critical hits.

monsters.lore: Orcs are savage raiders who glory in battle and destruction.
monsters.tactics: Orc berserkers charge directly at the strongest-looking foe.

monsters.name: Giant Spider
monsters.description: A massive arachnid with venomous fangs and web-spinning capabilities.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee natural attack. Target must Save or take poison damage.

actions.name: Web
actions.description: Ranged attack. On hit, target is restrained by webbing.

monsters.lore: Giant spiders lurk in dark caves and dense forests.
monsters.tactics: Giant spiders web targets from afar, then close in for the kill.

monsters.name: Cultist Fanatic
monsters.description: A devoted follower of dark powers, capable of minor spellcasting.

actions.name: Dark Bolt
actions.description: Ranged spell attack dealing necrotic damage.

monsters.lore: Cultists serve dark masters in exchange for forbidden power.
monsters.tactics: Cultists attack from range, protecting more powerful cult leaders.

monsters.name: Ogre
monsters.description: A hulking brute of great strength and little intelligence.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.description: Melee weapon attack with extended reach.

actions.name: Rock
actions.description: Ranged attack hurling a large rock.

monsters.lore: Ogres are dim-witted giants that bully smaller creatures.
monsters.tactics: Ogres charge the nearest enemy and pummel it with their club.

monsters.name: Young Dragon
monsters.description: A juvenile dragon, already a fearsome predator with breath weapon.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee natural attack. Can make two claw attacks.

actions.name: Breath Weapon
actions.description: 30-foot cone. Each creature in area must Save or take full damage. Recharge 5-6.

monsters.lore: Dragons are the apex predators of fantasy worlds, hoarding treasure and terrorizing the land.
monsters.tactics: Young dragons use their breath weapon first, then engage in melee with bite and claws.
